vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_rdseqnum(unsigned short FlibHndl, ODBSEQ *seqnum);

cmn.p: Reads the sequence number of the NC program which is being currently executed in CNC.
If the NC program has no sequence numbers in its all blocks, the sequence number of the last executed block is read.
This function is used for watch the block being executed or the current process by the application program, or only displaying the current sequence number.
The sequence number is stored in "buf.data" with unsigned binary format.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.

Pointer to the ODBSEQ structure including the sequence number under execution.
The ODBSEQ structure is as follows.

item.name: EW_PARAM
item.content:
CNC parameter error (Only Series 15)
7613#0=0 when CNC is turned on.
Set CNC parameter again.

option.hssb: The extended driver/library function is necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 16i/18i/21i-B, 0i-B/C/D/F, Series 30i and PMi-A, the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.

type.ul:
Series 15 7613#0=1 (must be set)
Series 30i/31i/32i, 0i-D/F, PMi-A 9000#0 (influenced by setting)
